org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter

Class AggregateSwitch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter.Switch
        • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter.AggregateSwitch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class AggregateSwitch
extends Switch
    This class allows to simulate aggregate switch for Datacenter network. It interacts with other switches in order to exchange packets. Please refer to following publication for more details: Saurabh Kumar Garg and Rajkumar Buyya, NetworkCloudSim: Modelling Parallel Applications in Cloud Simulations, Proceedings of the 4th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Utility and Cloud Computing (UCC 2011, IEEE CS Press, USA), Melbourne, Australia, December 5-7, 2011.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
    Author:
    Saurabh Kumar Garg

    • Constructor Detail

      • AggregateSwitch

        public AggregateSwitch(String name,
               int level,
               NetworkDatacenter dc)
        Constructor for Aggregate Switch We have to specify switches that are connected to its downlink and uplink ports, and corresponding bandwidths
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the switch
        level - At which level switch is with respect to hosts.
        dc - Pointer to Datacenter
